item.description:
THIS IS A MULTI GROUP MEETUP!!!


I'm in love with a great guy...but

I want to ask her out again ...but

Is he seeing another woman...

Is she too high maintenance...

Why doesn't he tell me about his day anymore...

I just want to have a night out with the "guys"...

Are Men really from Mars? Are Women really from Venus?

Well, you're going to find out...because we're gonna ask them! That's right! A special night devoted to those all important topics...what do men want in a woman...what do women want in a man!!!

We have a fun filled event planned for you...a debate, a Q & A session, some role playing and a ton of laughs. All done in a structured setting designed to promote a better understanding of the opposite sex.
It's all done in fun, but just in case we'll have our referees on duty...lol!!!

Ladies, this is your chance to find out how to attract the man of your dreams. Men, it's your big chance too...what will make her melt in your arms! It promises to be a great night and you are invited!!!

We will start the evening with a great meal. We will break bread together and enjoy a fantastic buffet dinner ...then we're gonna turn you loose...lol. Get set to do a little debating...do a little explaining and laugh til your side hurts.

Don't miss this event!!!

FIRST... THE MEAL...

Appetizers (Assorted)
Salad
Bread
Roasted Chicken
Pork Loin
Pasta (Penne with Marinara Sauce)
Roasted Potatos
Mixed Vegetables (All Fresh)
Coffee, Tea and Soft Drinks
Desserts ( Rice Pudding and Tiramasu and extras)

All this for a mere $26.00 per person. What a great meal and a fun event!

So, come and join us and bring your friends...bring your coworkers...bring your family (adults only, please). Just be certain to RSVP for the proper amount of guests you will be bringng.

You can RSVP on your respective Meetup sites, but you must pay on my site...Have Fun, Will Travel (if you are not a member of my site, you will have to join in order to pay). You will be asked to pay by Amazon. If you prefer, you can mail a check to: Terri Bruno, 319 Todd Road, Wolcott, CT 06716

BTW... there will be door prizes to round out the evening!

So...come one...come all. We plan to unite the Martians and the Venusians here on Earth!!!


* there will be a cash bar for your enjoyment.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the big room as you enter the restaurant!

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: MEN ARE FROM MARS...WOMEN ARE FROM VENUS !!!
